name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lock In: Block Distractions. Unlock Focus.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distractions, focus better, and Lock In. Choose your focus time and stay on track effortlessly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Lock In" is your ultimate focus companion. Choose your focus duration, block distracting websites, and create a productive environment tailored to your needs. Whether you're working, studying, or just need uninterrupted time, "Lock In" helps you stay on track by putting distractions on hold. Take control of your time, stay locked in, and achieve your goals effortlessly!
